content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <source name="OCLC" active="false"  type="OCLC"  uri="https://server16445.contentdm.oclc.org/dmwebservices/index.php"  logo="http://www.contentdm.org/help6/images/ball_logo_green_bg.gif"  mediaLocation="http://europeanastatic.eu/api/image?type=IMAGE&uri=">   <!--todo: need to construct medialocation on a per type basis-->   <query>     <prependTerms to="q" term="dmQuery/all/CISOSEARCHALL^"/>     <addTerms to="q" term="first+world"/>     <appendTerms to="q" term="^all^and/title!subjec!descri!locati/nosort/50/1/0/0/0/0/xml"/>   </query>   <results>     <mappings result_field="dc.coverage" source_field="locat"/>     <mappings result_field="dc.title" source_field="title"/>     <mappings result_field="dc.description" source_field="descri"/>     <mappings result_field="dc.subject" source_field="subjec"/>     <mappings result_field="dc.type" source_field="filetype"/>        </results> </source>
